sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script is used to update solution definition and its related records (solution..) in km/if/com.snc.contextual_search_ml plugin. It also migrates reference field for 'ml_solution_definition' in cxs_search_res_config table.</description> <name>[Orlando] Update km/if/cxs_ml Records</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var km_cxs_solution_names = ['ml_sn_global_knowledge_similar_articles']; new global.MLSchemaFixScriptHelper().fixMLSchemaforOrlandoUpgrade(km_cxs_solution_names, 'include'); new global.MLSchemaFixScriptHelper().migrateMLDefinitionReferences('cxs_search_res_config', 'cxs_solution_definition', 'ml_capability_definition'); gs.info('Fix Script: Updated KM CXS Solution Defintions: ' + km_cxs_solution_names.join());]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-10-23 05:39:28</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3010d02767200010b3d782f45685ef46</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>[Orlando] Update km/if/cxs_ml Records</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Knowledge Management - Machine Learning" source="sn_km_ml">b715410673dc330083511c86fbf6a74d</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Knowledge Management - Machine Learning">b715410673dc330083511c86fbf6a74d</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3010d02767200010b3d782f45685ef46</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-10-23 05:40:20</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
